Question
========

The following 5 numbers were drawn from a population:_____________________. 57, 43, 89, 66, 70. The two-sided 95% confidence interval for the population mean is

Answerlist
----------

* <43.95;86.05>
* <45.51;84.49>
* <46.17;83.83>
* <48.83;81.17>

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* <43.95;86.05>: Correct
* <45.51;84.49>: Incorrect
* <46.17;83.83>: Incorrect
* <48.83;81.17>: Incorrect
